articles.content: In a first pass at gauging the economic impact from the Ukraine invasion, forecasters say the U.S. will grow more slowly with higher inflation, Europe's economy will flirt near recession and Russia w… [+3994 chars]

articles.title: Indian police arrest NSE stock exchange's former chief - Reuters India
articles.description: India's federal police on Sunday arrested the former chief executive of the National Stock Exchange of India in a case related to alleged governance lapses at India's top bourse, a source with direct knowledge told Reuters.
articles.content: NEW DELHI, March 6 (Reuters) - India's federal police on Sunday arrested the former chief executive of the National Stock Exchange of India in a case related to alleged governance lapses at India's t… [+1073 chars]

articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: The metaverse, explained: what it is, and why tech companies love it - Polygon
articles.description: Tech companies like Meta and Epic Games insist it’s the future of the internet, but the metaverse has been around in the form of video games and virtual worlds for decades — and it’s not taking over our lives yet
articles.content:
What is the metaverse?
Good question. Metaverse is currently a major buzzword in the worlds of tech, business, and finance, and like all buzzwords its definition is fuzzy, contested, and shaped by t… [+12079 chars]
